quote: Our emotions pull us in different directions. The stronger the emotion, the greater the pull. Feelings are not always practical, nor do they make any logical sense. That's just the way it goes.
author: Lang Leav, Sad Girls

quote: Yes, I value emotions deeply.Call me sensitive, call me weak, call me outdated, call me anything you may, but tell me the truth, can you deny emotions give life to life. If Emotions are an integral part of Being Human,Why do people suppress feeling them ?Does the bruising scare them ? Than I wonder who is weak ?
author: Drishti Bablani, Wordions

quote: Emotions are some merciless attention seekers you know.You ignore them they destroy you.
author: Drishti Bablani, Wordions | Uns
tags: drishti-bablani, emotions, express-emotions, uns, wordions, wordions-com

quote: Yes, I value emotions deeply.Call me sensitive, call me weak, call me outdated, call me anything you may, but tell me the truth, can you deny emotions give life to life. If Emotions are an integral part of Being Human,why do people suppress feeling them ?Does the bruising scare them ? Than I wonder who is weak ?
author: Drishti Bablani, Wordions | Uns
tags: being-human-quotes, drishti-bablani, emotions, sensitive, wordions, wordions-com

quote: Emotions cannot evolve through intellectual comprehension; there must be direct access to them, access that allows them to go through a transformation from the plane in which they actually exist.
author: Shai Tubali, A Guide to Bliss: Transforming Your Life through Mind Expansion

quote: From my new release Cry for MeThis is Mrs. Hazelton speaking to Maria"...emotions have no color, no culture, knows no prejudice and can hardly be controlled, so in trying to raise children we need all the help and resources available to us . . .
author: Toni Mariani

quote: You mean it's to be peace between you and Elizabeth until after the Tapestry?" cried Georgie, horrified. The prospect of a cessation of hostilities was appalling, for this warfare provided him with the excitement that no other occupation could hope to offer. "Isn't that a bit drastic?
author: Tom Holt, Lucia Triumphant

quote: Emotions play a vital part in the social transmission of news and information. Interest, happiness, disgust, surprise, sadness, anger, fear and contempt affect how some stories catch on and travel far wider than others.
author: Alfred Hermida, Tell Everyone: Why We Share and Why It Matters

quote: When you are filled with inner clutter, the chaos reflects in your personality as obsessiveness, confusion, disorganisation, broken speech patterns, insomnia, indecisiveness, and lack of direction. When your home and world are in disrray, you can't relax. It takes more energy to be in chaos because you have to keep track of all the junk. Eventually exhaustion sets in. When you honestly look at clutter and ask if it's necessary in your life, buried emotions come to the surface.... Toss what's unnecessary so that you can finally relax, and your remaining possessions will have a clear place to land.
author: Brooks Palmer, Clutter Busting: Letting Go of What's Holding You Back

quote: When love carries us away on its brittle wings, we are too intoxicated to comprehend its power. We just want to soar and feel its adventurous spirit. The realistic aspect of love is not that romantic.
author: Balroop Singh, Emotional Truths Of Relationships

quote: Let the one before you not witness your inner fight;Keep your chaotic thoughts and emotions tight.For now, it is your soul that I test,Which is where yourself you manifest.It’s high time you become truly wise;Learn not to fall to evil in disguise.Confuse the one before you, as you are confused;Never let your feelings be used or abused.
author: Melita Tessy, Battle of the Spheres: Crust, Mantle and Core
tags: confusion, emotions, evil-in-disguise, inner-fight, inner-fire, inner-strength, poetry-quotes

quote: I’m kind of a contagion cryer. You know how when one person starts yawning, everyone else starts yawning too? Or when someone vomits, the smell makes you want to hurl? I’m like that, except with crying.
author: Nicola Yoon, The Sun Is Also a Star

quote: The problem is not the misunderstanding we have, but the understanding we have missed. We must come to come to a certain understanding; to understand understanding, we need to understand understanding and we must understand with understanding!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
tags: confused-mind, confusion-and-attitude, emotions, little-things, love-quotes-and-sayings, misunderstanding, problem-solving, understanding-quotes

So when exhilarating transgressions required getting over on authority figures, I knew how to do it. I was a great bluffer. And when common, everyday survival in prison required getting over, I could do that too. This is what was approvingly described by my fellow prisoners as 'street-smarts,' as in 'You wouldn't think it to look at her, but Piper's got street-smarts.
